body:
Heeya,

Seth and I just found a way to join Avicus again.
use the IP. 1.8.avic.us 
It's currently the only way to join.

The problem is that one of the lobbies is down and it looks like avic.us tries to log onto this server.

Good luck!

If you encounter any issues, please reply with:
What IP did you use?
What version did you use?

title: PSA: To Join Avicus use: 1.8.avic.us
